name: Cittadini Group
description: Cittadini Group is a global leader in the integrated supply of high-quality products and services in the construction and building materials sector. Founded in the early 1970s, Cittadini has established itself as a cornerstone in delivering innovative solutions that cater to the diverse needs of architects, builders, and contractors. The company specializes in the manufacturing and distribution of premium construction materials, including concrete, aggregates, and engineered wood products. With a strong emphasis on sustainability, Cittadini Group prioritizes environmentally-friendly practices in its operations, aiming to reduce carbon footprints and promote the use of renewable resources. The company has invested heavily in research and development to innovate in product performance, durability, and aesthetic appeal. In addition to construction materials, Cittadini provides expert consultation and project management services to ensure that clients receive comprehensive support throughout their projects. With a global presence that spans multiple continents, Cittadini Group is committed to excellence in quality, customer service, and innovation, making it a trusted partner in the construction industry.

seo.meta_title: Cittadini Group | Leading Construction and Building Materials Supplier
seo.meta_description: Explore Cittadini Group, a global leader in construction materials and services. Discover our commitment to innovation, quality, and sustainability.

faq.question: What products does Cittadini Group offer?
faq.answer: Cittadini Group offers a range of construction materials including concrete, aggregates, and engineered wood products, along with consultation services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Cittadini Group?
faq.answer: Marco Cittadini is the CEO of Cittadini Group.

faq.question: Where is Cittadini Group headquartered?
faq.answer: Cittadini Group is headquartered in Milan, Italy.

faq.question: When was Cittadini Group founded?
faq.answer: Cittadini Group was founded in the early 1970s.
